Title: Osun 2026: Groups demand Christian aspirants
Summary: Leadership of three Christian groups insisted that Christians in Osun State will produce the next governor . The group, in a joint statement signed by Bishop Seun Seun, said Christians in the state will produce a governor . Osun 2026: Groups demand Christian aspirants .

Title: Stones backs Man City team-mate Foden to pose England dilemma for Tuchel
Summary: John Stones believes Manchester City team-mate Phil Foden has given England manager Thomas Tuchel a selection headache . England face Serbia and Albania in their final World Cup qualifiers next week .

Title: Sanwo-Olu launches climate policy to attract investments
Summary: Lagos State Governor, Babajide Sanwo-Olu, unveiled the Climate Investment Opportunities Diagnostic (CIOD) The initiative was launched at the 11th Lagos International Climate Change Summit . The CIOD is designed to link the state's environmental goals with actionable investment pathways .

Title: Inverroche Gin X The Afropolitan Lifestyle Podcast: A cultural collaboration bridging heritage and modern African storytelling
Summary: Inverroche Gin is an ultra-premium South African gin crafted with rare Fynbos botanicals from the Cape Floral region . The Afropolitan Lifestyle Podcast celebrates Africa’s creative excellence and global influence . The collaboration marks the beginning of a cultural collaboration bridging heritage and modern African storytelling .

Title: I have power to declare Sowore wanted, says Lagos CP
Summary: Lagos State Commissioner of Police stated that he has the authority to declare Sowore wanted . Contrary to the Nigerian constitution, the Lagos CP said he has power to declare the wanted .

Title: FEC proposes Presidential Task Force on ‘Detty December’
Summary: Federal Executive Council proposes creation of a Presidential Task Force on 'Detty December' FEC proposed the creation of the task force on ‘Detty . December’

Title: Alleged N400m Fraud: Court strikes out charge against Senator Uba
Summary: Federal High Court in Abuja strikes out N400m fraud charge against Senator Andy Uba . The former lawmaker for Anambra South Senatorial District, Senator Uba, was accused of N400million fraud .

Title: INEC begins distribution of sensitive materials for Saturday’s Anambra guber election
Summary: INEC has commenced distribution of sensitive and non-sensitive materials for the November 8, 2025 Anambra State governorship election . The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) has commenced the distribution .

Title: APC supporters vow to mobilise one million votes for Tinubu, Osun guber poll
Summary: Supporters of the All Progressives Congress, APC, in Osun State and some Yoruba nollywood actors stormed the streets of Osogbo, the state capital on Thursday . The APC groups, under the aegis, Ajisope Development Initiatives from converged at the Osogbo City Stadium from Thursday

Title: 2026: Osun-West APC youths adopt Oyebamiji
Summary: The youth wing from Osun-West senatorial district gathered at the Senatorial headquarters in Iwo . They expressed their support for Oyebamiji, popularly called Mr Oyebamaiji . The party is preparing for its governorship primary .
